response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs perfectly. I am offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 14000}
